page.title: 08ROADS AND TRANSPORT
page.content: This is a survey of{TRAFFIC,TRANSPORT {TYPES}and{ROAD CONDITION.}The method we used was A)Went to 6 stations.B)We took{TRAFFIC SURVEYS}C)We described & measured the road.Surveys were taken on the{10/6/1985}between the times of {14:30}&{15:40}by{TOM SHIELD,CHRIS {ADDLETON,BRYAN HUCKNALL}&{PETER {TOMPKIN. } {Mon-Fri buses.SERVICE 7/A.} SPRING LANE.. 0714 0819 0922 1634 2029 LAMBLEY(NAGS HEAD) 0824 0927 1639 2034 LAMBLEY(WOODLARK) 0827 0930 1642 2037 WOODBOROUGH(4BELLS)0832 0934 1646 2041 (Extract from local bus timetables.) {STATION 1_PLAINS RD/B684.}Lined,10 m wide,catseyes.Pavements,kerbs,gutters one side.Bus service..27 cars,4 vans,3 lorries=34.680 p/hr.ST 2_CATFOOT LANE. Unlined,mettled,5 m wide,no catseyes, no pavements,kerb,gutters,bus services .8 cars=8.160 p/hr.ST 3_MAIN STREET
